casebody.data:
In the Matter of KENMORE-GRANVILLE HOTEL COMPANY, etc., Debtor. Nettie MEYER et al. v. KENMORE GRANVILLE HOTEL COMPANY et al. No. 5531. Circuit Court of Appeals, Seventh Circuit. July 9, 1935. Meyer Abrams, of Chicago, Ill., for appellants. Irving H. Flamm, Max Frederick Goldberg, Bernard Nath, Herbert Lautmann, I. E. Ferguson, Arthur M. Cox, Claude A. Roth, and William J. Friedman, all of Chicago, Ill., for appellees.

Before EVANS and SPARKS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

It is ordered by the court that the appeal granted to Nettie Meyer et al. by the District Court of the United States for the Northern District of Illinois, Eastern Division, in this cause from an order entered by said District Court on May 20, 1935, approving a plan of reorganization, be, and the same is hereby, dismissed, with costs.
